segments.text: Oh , my ! It's really hot . I've never seen such scorching weather in my life .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me about it ! It's like the whole world is broiling .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , look at the thermometer ! The temperature has hit 98 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope it's not gonna break into three digits
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I just hope it'll level off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess you can ’ t do anything until after dark then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess so . What else can we do ? You can ’ t stay in the heat for long .
segments.speaker: S2
